pli-tv-pvr1.2:1.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:1.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:1.3: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:1.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:1.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.2:1.6: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:2.3: Pañcamāsakaṃ vā atirekapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:2.4: atirekamāsakaṃ vā ūnapañcamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:2.5: māsakaṃ vā ūnamāsakaṃ vā agghanakaṃ adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.2:2.6: adinnaṃ ādiyanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:3.1: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:3.2: Sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:3.3: Manussaṃ odissa opātaṃ khaṇati “papatitvā marissatī”ti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:3.4: papatite dukkhā vedanā uppajjati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:3.6: sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropento imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:4.1: Asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:4.2: Asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:4.3: Pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:4.4: “yo te vihāre vasati, so bhikkhu arahā”ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:4.6: asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:6.1: () Upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:6.3: ceteti upakkamati na muccati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:7.1: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:8.1: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:8.2: Vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati, avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:8.3: vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṃ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:8.4: kāyapaṭibaddhaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #3
pli-tv-pvr1.2:9.1: Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:9.2: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:9.3: paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:9.4: tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.2:10.3: paṭiggaṇhāti vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:10.4: paṭiggaṇhāti na vīmaṃsati na paccāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. #5
pli-tv-pvr1.2:11.1: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:12.1: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:13.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:13.2: Anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:13.3: okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa. #8
pli-tv-pvr1.2:14.1: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:14.2: Anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā cāvanādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:14.3: okāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadeti, āpatti omasavādassa. #9
pli-tv-pvr1.2:15.1: Saṃghabhedako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:16.1: Bhedakānuvattakā bhikkhū yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantā tisso āpattiyo āpajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:17.1: Dubbaco bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:18.1: Kuladūsako bhikkhu yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:20.1: Atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:21.1: Ekarattaṃ ticīvarena vippavasanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:22.1: Akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:23.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:24.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:25.1: Aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:26.1: Aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā tatuttari cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:27.1: Pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:28.1: Pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:29.1: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena cīvaraṃ abhinipphādento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:31.1: Kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:32.1: Suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:33.1: Anādiyitvā tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:34.1: Anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:35.1: Anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:36.1: Eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:36.2: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ tiyojanaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:37.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:39.1: Nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:40.1: Nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:42.1: Atirekapattaṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:43.1: Ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:44.1: Bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:45.1: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:46.1: Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:47.1: Sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:48.1: Pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:49.1: Accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:50.1: Tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:51.1: Jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:53.3: Pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:53.4: bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:53.5: “yo te vihāre vasati, so bhikkhu arahā”ti bhaṇati, paṭivijānantassa āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:53.8: sampajānamusāvādaṃ bhāsanto imā pañca āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.2:56.1: Anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vācento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:57.1: Anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:58.1: Mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:59.1: Mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:60.1: Anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhūtaṃ ārocento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:61.1: Bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:65.2: Anāropite aññavādake aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:65.3: āropite aññavādake aññenaññaṃ paṭicarati, āpatti pācittiyassa. #2
pli-tv-pvr1.2:67.1: Saṃghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:67.2: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ leḍḍupātaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:68.1: Saṃghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:68.2: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:69.1: Saṃghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:70.1: Bhikkhuṃ kupito anattamano saṃghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:71.1: Saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:72.1: Dvattipariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:73.1: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñcanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:75.1: Asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:76.1: Atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:77.1: Bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:78.1: “Āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti bhaṇanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:79.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:80.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:81.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:82.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:83.1: Jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:84.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:86.1: Tatuttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:89.1: Dvattipattapūre pūve paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:90.1: Bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:91.1: Bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:91.2: Tassa vacanena “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:92.1: Vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:93.1: Sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:94.1: Paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:95.1: Adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:97.1: Acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:98.2: “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:99.1: Sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:100.1: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:101.1: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:102.1: Nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:102.2: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:103.1: Tatuttari bhesajjaṃ viññāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:104.1: Uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gacchanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:105.1: Atirekatirattaṃ senāya vasanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:109.1: Bhikkhuṃ aṅgulipatodakena hāsento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:113.1: Jotiṃ samādahitvā visibbento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:115.1: Anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:116.1: Bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:117.1: Bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidhento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:119.1: Sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:119.2: Sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento catasso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:119.5: manusso tasmiṃ papatitvā marati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:119.6: yakkho vā peto vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho vā tasmiṃ papatitvā marati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:119.7: tiracchānagato tasmiṃ papatitvā marati, āpatti pācittiyassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.2:119.8: sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropento imā catasso āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.2:120.1: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:121.1: Jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:122.1: Bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati, pācittiyaṃ. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.2:123.1: Jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:124.1: Jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:125.1: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:126.1: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:127.1: Jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:128.1: Jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:130.2: “na tāvāhaṃ, āvuso, etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchissāmī”ti bhaṇanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:133.1: Bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:134.1: Bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggiranto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:135.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṃghādisesena anuddhaṃsento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:136.1: Bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadahanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:137.1: Bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭhanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:138.1: Dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:139.1: Saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:140.1: Samaggena saṃghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:141.1: Jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:143.1: Pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pavisanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:143.2: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ ummāraṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:145.1: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:145.2: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ parikkhepaṃ atikkāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.2:146.1: Aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:147.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:148.1: Mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:149.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ nisīdanaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:150.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:151.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:152.1: Sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpento kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:152.2: Sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpento dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:152.5: sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #10
pli-tv-pvr1.2:154.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:154.2: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:154.5: aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.2:155.1: Bhikkhuniyā vosāsantiyā na nivāretvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:156.1: Sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:157.1: Āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:157.2: Āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:157.5: āraññakesu senāsanesu pubbe appaṭisaṃviditaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā ajjhārāme sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanto imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati. #4
pli-tv-pvr1.2:159.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāsento kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:159.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāsento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:159.4: anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento nivāsento imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. #1
pli-tv-pvr1.2:160.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambento pārupanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:161.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:162.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyaṃ vivaritvā antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:163.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kīḷāpento antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:164.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kīḷāpento antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:165.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:166.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:167.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:168.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ukkhittakāya antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:170.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ujjagghikāya antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:171.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ujjagghikāya antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:172.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonto antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:173.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca uccāsaddaṃ mahāsaddaṃ karonto antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:174.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:175.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kāyappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:176.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:177.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:178.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:179.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:181.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca khambhakato antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:182.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca khambhakato antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:183.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca oguṇṭhito antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:184.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca oguṇṭhito antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:185.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:186.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:187.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:188.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:189.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:190.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpīkataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:192.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:193.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ olokento piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:194.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:195.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaññeva bahuṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:196.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:197.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā odanena paṭicchādento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:198.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:199.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ujjhānasaññī paresaṃ pattaṃ olokento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:200.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca mahantaṃ kabaḷaṃ karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:201.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca dīghaṃ ālopaṃ karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:203.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivaranto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:204.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:205.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:206.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca piṇḍukkhepakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:207.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca kabaḷāvacchedakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:208.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca avagaṇḍakārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:209.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthaniddhunakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:210.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sitthāvakārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:211.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca jivhānicchārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:212.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca capucapukārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:214.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:215.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca hatthanillehakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:216.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pattanillehakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:217.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca oṭṭhanillehakaṃ bhuñjanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:218.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhanto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:219.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sasitthakaṃ pattadhovanaṃ antaraghare chaḍḍento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:220.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:221.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca daṇḍapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:222.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca satthapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:223.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:225.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:226.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca upāhanāruḷhassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:227.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca yānagatassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:228.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca sayanagatassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:229.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:230.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca veṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:231.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca oguṇṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:232.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca chamāyaṃ nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:233.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:234.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito nisinnassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:235.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca pacchato gacchanto purato gacchantassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:236.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca uppathena gacchanto pathena gacchantassa dhammaṃ desento ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:237.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca ṭhito uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:238.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca harite uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:239.4: anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati. #15
